author: SkinnyTaste
name: Air Fryer Sweet Plantains
instructions: Spray the air fryer basket with olive oil. Cut the ends off the plantain then using a sharp pairing knife, cut a slit along the length to peel. Remove the skin carefully and transfer to the air fryer basket. Spray with more oil on top and air fryer 370F about 8 minutes on each side, until tender. Then slice them and enjoy.
